Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at North Avenue/Clark
ShortDescription: 72 North buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#72 North Avenue buses will terminate at North Avenue/Clark due to a beach terminal closure because of overcrowding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed Pulaski
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski with major delays due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski with major delays due to police activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
